esp32_board.jpg.name: ESP32 Board
esp32_board.jpg.description: A microcontroller module with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, used for IoT projects, embedded systems, and robotics.

switch.jpg.name: Switch
switch.jpg.description: An electrical component that opens or closes a circuit, controlling the flow of electricity to a device.

usb_port.jpg.name: USB Power Port
usb_port.jpg.description: A connector used to supply power and data transfer, commonly for charging devices or powering electronics.
